body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" standalone="no"?>
<csw:GetRecords
    xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2"
    xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml"
    xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    service="CSW"
    version="2.0.2"
    resultType="results"
    maxRecords="10"
    outputFormat="application/xml"
    outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/csw/2.0.2/CSW-discovery.xsd" >
  <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record">
    <csw:ElementSetName>full</csw:ElementSetName>
    <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0">
      <ogc:Filter>
        <ogc:Intersects>
          <ogc:PropertyName>ows:BoundingBox</ogc:PropertyName>
          <gml:Polygon>
            <gml:exterior>
              <gml:LinearRing>
                <gml:posList>
                  47.00 -5.00 55.00 -5.00 55.00 20.00 47.00 20.00 47.00 -5.00
                </gml:posList>
              </gml:LinearRing>
            </gml:exterior>
          </gml:Polygon>
        </ogc:Intersects>
      </ogc:Filter>
    </csw:Constraint>
  </csw:Query>
</csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2"  xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" service="CSW" version="2.0.2"
    resultType="results"  outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2"
    startPosition="11"
    maxRecords="15"
    >
    <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record">
        <csw:ElementSetName>full</csw:ElementSetName>
        <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0">
            <ogc:Filter>
                <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" singleChar="?" escapeChar="\" matchCase="false">
                    <ogc:PropertyName>dc:title</ogc:PropertyName>
                    <ogc:Literal>*ctd*</ogc:Literal>
                </ogc:PropertyIsLike>
            </ogc:Filter>
        </csw:Constraint>
    </csw:Query>
</csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2"  xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" service="CSW" version="2.0.2"
    resultType="results"  outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2">
    <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record">
        <csw:ElementSetName>full</csw:ElementSetName>
        <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0">
            <ogc:Filter>
                <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" singleChar="?" escapeChar="\" matchCase="false">
                    <ogc:PropertyName>csw:AnyText</ogc:PropertyName>
                    <ogc:Literal>*bremanger*</ogc:Literal>
                </ogc:PropertyIsLike>
            </ogc:Filter>
        </csw:Constraint>
    </csw:Query>
</csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2"  xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" service="CSW" version="2.0.2"
    resultType="results"  outputSchema="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2">
    <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record">
        <csw:ElementSetName>full</csw:ElementSetName>
        <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0">
            <ogc:Filter>
                <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" singleChar="?" escapeChar="\" matchCase="false">
                    <ogc:PropertyName>dc:format</ogc:PropertyName>
                    <ogc:Literal>*csv*</ogc:Literal>
                </ogc:PropertyIsLike>
            </ogc:Filter>
        </csw:Constraint>
    </csw:Query>
</csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<csw:Transaction xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/csw/2.0.2/CSW-publication.xsd" service="CSW" version="2.0.2">
<csw:Insert>
<gmd:MD_Metadata xmlns:gmd="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd http://schemas.opengis.net/csw/2.0.2/profiles/apiso/1.0.0/apiso.xsd">
	<gmd:fileIdentifier>
		<gco:CharacterString>123456</gco:CharacterString>
	</gmd:fileIdentifier>
	<gmd:hierarchyLevel>
		<gmd:MD_ScopeCode codeList="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/codeList.xml#MD_ScopeCode" codeListValue="dataset"/>
	</gmd:hierarchyLevel>
	<gmd:contact>
		<gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty>
			<gmd:organisationName>
				<gco:CharacterString>NIVA</gco:CharacterString>
			</gmd:organisationName>
			<gmd:role>
				<gmd:CI_RoleCode codeList="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/codeList.xml#CI_RoleCode" codeListValue="publisher"/>
			</gmd:role>
		</gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty>
	</gmd:contact>
	<gmd:dateStamp>
		<gco:Date>2011-05-17</gco:Date>
	</gmd:dateStamp>
	<gmd:identificationInfo>
		<gmd:MD_DataIdentification>
			<gmd:citation>
				<gmd:CI_Citation>
					<gmd:title>
						<gco:CharacterString>Kim superduper dataset</gco:CharacterString>
					</gmd:title>
					<gmd:date>
						<gmd:CI_Date>
							<gmd:date>
								<gco:Date>2021-09-20</gco:Date>
							</gmd:date>
							<gmd:dateType>
								<gmd:CI_DateTypeCode codeList="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/codeList.xml#CI_DateTypeCode" codeListValue="revision"/>
							</gmd:dateType>
						</gmd:CI_Date>
					</gmd:date>
				</gmd:CI_Citation>
			</gmd:citation>
			<gmd:abstract>
				<gco:CharacterString>Sample metadata record</gco:CharacterString>
			</gmd:abstract>
			<gmd:language>
				<gco:CharacterString>eng</gco:CharacterString>
			</gmd:language>
			<gmd:extent>
				<gmd:EX_Extent>
					<gmd:geographicElement>
						<gmd:EX_GeographicBoundingBox>
							<gmd:westBoundLongitude>
								<gco:Decimal>-180</gco:Decimal>
							</gmd:westBoundLongitude>
							<gmd:eastBoundLongitude>
								<gco:Decimal>180</gco:Decimal>
							</gmd:eastBoundLongitude>
							<gmd:southBoundLatitude>
								<gco:Decimal>-90</gco:Decimal>
							</gmd:southBoundLatitude>
							<gmd:northBoundLatitude>
								<gco:Decimal>90</gco:Decimal>
							</gmd:northBoundLatitude>
						</gmd:EX_GeographicBoundingBox>
					</gmd:geographicElement>
				</gmd:EX_Extent>
			</gmd:extent>
		</gmd:MD_DataIdentification>
	</gmd:identificationInfo>
</gmd:MD_Metadata>
</csw:Insert>
</csw:Transaction>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<csw:Transaction xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2 http://schemas.opengis.net/csw/2.0.2/CSW-publication.xsd" service="CSW" version="2.0.2">
  <csw:Delete>
    <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0">
      <ogc:Filter>
        <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo>
          <ogc:PropertyName>dc:identifier</ogc:PropertyName>
          <ogc:Literal>123456789</ogc:Literal>
        </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo>
      </ogc:Filter>
    </csw:Constraint>
  </csw:Delete>
</csw:Transaction>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<csw:Transaction xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" service="CSW" version="2.0.2" verboseResponse="false">
  <csw:Insert>
    <csw:Record>
      <ns1:rights xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">otherRestrictions</ns1:rights>
      <ns1:spatial xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" scheme="http://www.opengis.net/def/crs">EPSG:4326</ns1:spatial>
      <ns1:references xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" scheme="WWW:DOWNLOAD-1.0-http--download" name="CSV-fil">https://aquamonitor.niva.no/nmdc/archives/jmgwuvw/Iddefjorden_hydrografi.nc</ns1:references>
      <ns1:identifier xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">1234567891</ns1:identifier>
      <ns1:modified xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">2020-06-09</ns1:modified>
      <ns1:date xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">2018-11-14T15:26:54</ns1:date>
      <ns1:abstract xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">Mock Iddefjorden, upward profiles, unprocessed raw data 2050</ns1:abstract>
      <ns1:description xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">Mock Iddefjorden, upward profiles, unprocessed raw data 2050</ns1:description>
      <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">OCEANS > OCEAN TEMPERATURE > WATER TEMPERATURE</ns1:subject>
      <ns1:title xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">Mock Iddefjorden 2050</ns1:title>
      <ns1:date xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">2020-06-09</ns1:date>
      <ns1:abstract xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">Mock Iddefjorden, upward profiles, unprocessed raw data 2050</ns1:abstract>
      <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">OCEANS > SALINITY/DENSITY > SALINITY</ns1:subject>
      <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"/>
      <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">oceans</ns1:subject>
      <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" scheme="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_TopicCategoryCode">climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere</ns1:subject>
      <ns1:BoundingBox xmlns:ns1="http://www.opengis.net/ows" crs="urn:x-ogc:def:crs:EPSG:6.11:4326" dimensions="2">
        <ns1:LowerCorner>11.44666 59.01166</ns1:LowerCorner>
        <ns1:UpperCorner>11.14666 59.11955993</ns1:UpperCorner>
      </ns1:BoundingBox>
    </csw:Record>
  </csw:Insert>
</csw:Transaction>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<csw:Transaction service="CSW" version="2.0.2" xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2">
    <csw:Insert>
        <MD_Metadata xmlns="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd" xmlns:gco="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
            <csw:Record>
                <ns1:rights xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">otherRestrictions</ns1:rights>
                <ns1:spatial xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" scheme="http://www.opengis.net/def/crs">EPSG:4326</ns1:spatial>
                <ns1:references xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" scheme="WWW:DOWNLOAD-1.0-http--download">https://aquamonitor.niva.no/nmdc/archives/jmgwuvw/Iddefjorden_hydrografi.nc</ns1:references>
                <ns1:identifier xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">1234567</ns1:identifier>
                <ns1:modified xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">2020-06-09</ns1:modified>
                <ns1:date xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">2018-11-14T15:26:54</ns1:date>
                <ns1:abstract xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">Mock Iddefjorden, upward profiles, unprocessed raw data 2050</ns1:abstract>
                <ns1:description xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">Mock Iddefjorden, upward profiles, unprocessed raw data 2050</ns1:description>
                <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">OCEANS > OCEAN TEMPERATURE > WATER TEMPERATURE</ns1:subject>
                <ns1:title xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">Mock Iddefjorden 2050</ns1:title>
                <ns1:date xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">2020-06-09</ns1:date>
                <ns1:abstract xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">Mock Iddefjorden, upward profiles, unprocessed raw data 2050</ns1:abstract>
                <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">OCEANS > SALINITY/DENSITY > SALINITY</ns1:subject>
                <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"/>
                <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">oceans</ns1:subject>
                <ns1:subject xmlns:ns1="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" scheme="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_TopicCategoryCode">climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere</ns1:subject>
                <ns1:BoundingBox xmlns:ns1="http://www.opengis.net/ows" crs="urn:x-ogc:def:crs:EPSG:6.11:4326" dimensions="2">
                    <ns1:LowerCorner>11.44666 59.01166</ns1:LowerCorner>
                    <ns1:UpperCorner>11.14666 59.11955993</ns1:UpperCorner>
                </ns1:BoundingBox>
            </csw:Record>
        </MD_Metadata>
    </csw:Insert>
</csw:Transaction>
